text: A strong backgammon player that uses modern machine learning techniques to play backgammon. It uses a two-headed approach, one for evaluation of which action to take, the other to evaluate the probability of winning. Both of the heads share the same network. This project also contains a surrounding framework that uses several networks to compete against each other in a round-robin fashion.
heading: Machine learning backgammon player
tags: AI machine-learning reinforcement-learning policy-gradient neural-network torch python
